string.text: Traditional outfit of a bandit – a leather jacket with attached kevlar elements. It slightly increases bullet and splinter protection. It does not protect from any anomaly influence.

SPECIAL OUTFIT. This jacket was taken from the body of a stalker who died in a Kissel anomaly. Having spent a long time in the anomaly, this jacket has acquired anomalous properties: it greatly accelerates the metabolism of the wearer. Traditional outfit of a bandit – a leather jacket with attached kevlar elements. It slightly increases bullet and splinter protection.
SPECIAL OUTFIT. It is made of a usual stalker jacket, but due to sewn-in thick felt strips its protective properties are increased, especially the protection from gravitational anomalies.

SPECIAL OUTFIT. The lining of this jacket contains a chain-mail made of hardened wire by some strange craftsman. The chain-mail provides excellent protection against bites and cuts, but is absolutely ineffective against bullets and anomalies. Besides, the metal makes the jacket heavier.
Bandit jacket
Animated jacket
Thick bandit jacket
Jacket with a chain-mail

It’s produced by one of Kiev defence research institutes to the order of the Duty group. It’s as simple and reliable as the standard PSZ-9 model, but due to the new materials it provides good protection from bullets and splinters, as well as from weak anomalies. It has no breath protection system, so its level of radiation protection is low.
SPECIAL OUTFIT. Special rubber added to the kevlar fabric made it more resistant to cuts. Unlike usual kevlar, this outfit provides excellent protection against bites and hits of monsters.
PSZ-9d Armour of Duty
Rubberized Armour of Duty

A wonderful protective outfit for the Zone. It combines excellent anomaly-proof and bullet-proof qualities. It includes PSZ-9d overall, a closed cycle breathing system, and an integrated system of anomalous field suppression. It provides good bullet and splinter protection. It has an average level of anomaly protection and a high level of radiation protection.
PSZ-9Md Universal Protection

A SSP-99 chemical protection suit specially designed for the Zone conditions. It’s used by scientific expeditions and the stalker ecologists who cooperate with them. It has an integrated system of air filtering and conditioning. It is heat and electricity resistant, provides good protection from the radiation and biological anomalies. It is resistant to chemically aggressive environment. It’s not designed for combat, so it provides neither bullet nor splinter protection.
SSP-99 Ecologist

A prototype of a military exoskeleton. Its serial production was never started due to its extreme cost and some design flaws. In spite of that it is produced in small batches at small illegal factories outside of Ukraine. This is a third generation exoskeleton. The design defects which used to decrease its mobility were eliminated, its armour was reinforced. It provides excellent bullet and splinter protection. It has a low level of anomaly protection.
Exoskeleton

Overalls of a stalker of the Freelancers group. Its design is based on the outfit of the special force units of the western armies. Due to some special treatment its fabric has stronger heat and radiation protection properties. Its protective properties are slightly better then those of the PSZ-7 military armour vests.

SPECIAL OUTFIT. Its armour is reinforced with a set of armour-plates which improve its protection from gunfire and monster bites. In all other respects these are the standard overalls of the Freelancers group.

SPECIAL OUTFIT. This suit was specially designed for long trips. Its trousers have integrated elastic ribbons which decrease the joint load during long walks. Some artefacts were also added (but no one knows what exactly). As a result the suit have become practically weightless for the wearer and acquired better protective characteristics.
Freelancer’s Overall
Reinforced Freelancer’s Overalls
Modified Freelancer’s Overalls

This Skat-9M military armour suit is designed for assault operations in the areas of increased anomalous activity. It includes a PSZ-12p heavy military armour suit, an integrated compensation suit, and a Sphere-12M helmet. It provides perfect protection from bullets and splinters, and it doesn’t decrease the soldier’s mobility. It has a balanced system of anomaly protection.
SPECIAL OUTFIT. A light version of the military armour suit made with use of super-modern titanium alloys. It’s somewhat lighter then a usual armour suit but provides the same reliable protection.
Military armour suit
Modified armour suit

Overalls of a stalker of the Monolith group. The producer is unknown. Its protective properties are slightly worse then those of the PSZ-9a military armour vest. Its structure resembles the one of the widely spread neutral stalkers’ overalls which combine an armour vest and a radiation protection suit. It provides good protection from gunfire. Its level of anomaly protection is low due to the absence of the air filtering system.

SPECIAL OUTFIT. A special model of the Monolith personal protection suit. It’s made of advanced technology materials and has a prototype psy-protection. Its defensive properties are superior to the ones of some military armour suits, besides, it can resist psy-attacks.
Monolith overalls
Modified Monolith overalls
An ordinary thick jacket, one of the many. It slightly increases bullet and splinter protection. It does not protect from any anomaly influence.
Leather jacket

A modified SSP-99 overall. It has increased body protection from bullets and splinters. It’s designed for the guards of the scientific expeditions. It’s heat and electricity resistant, provides good protection from radiation and biological anomalies. It’s resistant to chemically aggressive environment.
SSP-99M overall

These overalls produced by one of Kiev defence research institutes are an excellent alternative to the stalkers’ hand-made overalls. They are an excellent combination of an armour outfit, a closed cycle breathing system, and an integrated system of anomalous field suppression. Due to the perfect choice of the materials, they are the best overalls within its class. They provide an average bullet and splinter protection. They have an average level of anomaly protection. Their only disadvantage is their price.
SEVA overalls

A Berill-5M military special force outfit modified for the Zone environment. It includes a PSZ-9a military armour vest with beryllium coating and a Sphere-08 helmet. It’s designed for assault operations in the areas with high background radiation. Its level of anomaly protection is low.

SPECIAL OUTFIT. Even a small cut can have serious consequences in the Zone, but it’s very risky to take off the chemical and radiation protection to treat the wound. This armour complex is specially designed to solve this problem – it has a lining impregnated with a mixture of disinfection and coagulants (which clot the blood). As a result, any wound as if being bandaged on itself. In all other respects it’s a usual Berill-5M armour suit. A Berill-5M is a military special force outfit modified for the Zone environment. It includes a PSZ-9a military armour vest with beryllium coating and a Sphere-08 helmet.
Berill-5M armour suit.
Healing Berill

Stalker’s overalls produced by some craftsman. They are an effective combination of a light military armour vest and of rubberized fabric suit. They are reinforced with inserted kevlar plates. They provide good protection from gunfire. They can also protect from a weak anomaly or radiation.

SPECIAL OUTFIT. Having spent a long time in the anomaly, these overalls have acquired a capability to reflect bullets. They cannot stop a bullet completely, but they can reduce its energy before the physical contact thus protecting their wearer.
SPECIAL OUTFIT. There are legends that the spectral stalker never takes a medpack. That all his wounds are healed very quickly. That he has unusual overalls he got in the anomaly.

SPECIAL OUTFIT. Overalls with some additional radiation protection and cylinders from a scientific protective suit. Probably, the stalker had no money to buy a scientific suit, so he modified his own, increased its psy protection.
Stalker’s overalls
Enchanted overalls
Spectral stalker’s overalls
Hermetic suit

Reinforced stalker’s overalls produced by the craftsmen of the Freedom group. They has a medium military armour vest and are plated with reinforcing zirconium elements which provide good protection from rifle bullets and splinters at a medium and long range. The material of the suit consists of two layers: specially treated leather and fabric with asbestos yarn. The overalls provide good protection from radiation and weak anomalies.
Guardian of Freedom overalls

Light stalker’s overalls produced by the craftsmen of the Freedom group. It consists of a light military armour vest and are plated with reinforcing kevlar elements. It can protect from a weak weapon. The fabric of the overalls is treated with a special mixture which increases the anomaly resistance.
Wind of Freedom overalls
